input.sentences: a traditional cook fire in action at the medieval festival .
a sword fighting demonstration to start things off .
this is how to parry a sword slash .
a tent set up for the tournament .
output.sentences: We got to see how a traditional medieval fire was made.
They even had a few men holding a sword who would start fighting one anotehr.
They fought and the sword slashed together causing a parry.
We enjoyed listening to all the traditional songs that they played.
Before the big tournament the tent was set up.
